Earn ₦800K in 8 Weeks with Coding Fundamentals (No Tech Experience Needed)

You don’t need a computer science degree, expensive software, or even prior experience to start making money with coding. All you need is the right guidance and a willingness to learn—which we’re ready to provide in this exclusive, life-changing training.

If you’re looking for a get-rich-quick scheme, please skip this. But if you’re ready to invest 30 to 90 days in a skill that can change your financial future, keep reading.”

Let's Get Started

Here's Why You NEED
to Act NOW!

Learning to code is one of the most valuable skills you can have in today’s digital world. With tech jobs on the rise and remote work becoming the norm, the ability to write code opens doors to high-paying opportunities and career advancement.

Our Coding Mastery Program is designed to help ANYONE—whether you’re a student, stay-at-home parent, or entrepreneur—earn ₦800,000+ monthly by mastering coding skills that are in HIGH DEMAND worldwide.

It doesn’t matter if:

  • You’ve never written a line of code before (we start from the very basics!).
  • You’re worried coding is too hard or complex (we’ll simplify everything!).
  • You don’t know which programming languages are in demand (we’ll guide you on where to focus!).
  • You think coding is only for tech experts (it’s not—this course is for everyone!).
Enroll Now

Where You Can Make Money After Training:

Why This Course is Worth ₦700,000

Programming Basics

Learn the fundamentals of coding, logic, and problem-solving.

HTML & CSS for Web Design

Build your first web pages using HTML & CSS, the foundational languages of the web.

JavaScript for Interactivity

Add interactivity and dynamic features to your websites with JavaScript.

Building Real-World Projects

Gain hands-on experience by building real applications and solving real-world problems.

Git & Version Control

Learn how to track your progress, collaborate on projects, and manage your code like a pro.

Job Search & Freelancing Strategies

Discover how to start earning ₦800,000+ monthly with your new coding skills.

Enroll Now

who is this For?

1

Students & Fresh Graduates Who Want a High-Income Skill

Coding is a future-proof skill that opens doors to multiple job opportunities in tech.

2

Freelancers Who Want to Expand Their Services

Adding coding skills to your services will allow you to offer web design, automation, and custom solutions to your clients.

3

Career Changers Looking to Enter the Tech Industry

You don’t need a degree to work in tech! This course will teach you coding fundamentals and help you transition into high-paying tech jobs.

4

Aspiring Entrepreneurs Who Want to Build Their Own Apps or Websites

Learn how to build and maintain your own websites and applications, saving money and gaining complete control over your projects.

Enroll Now

The Price? Practically a Giveaway

We’ve priced this course at ₦700,000 because that’s what it’s truly worth, but here’s the deal:

  • If you enroll TODAY, you’ll pay just ₦350,000!
  • Pay within 12 hours, and we’ll further slash it to ₦200,000 ONLY!

That’s a ₦500,000 discount—a small investment for the skills that can set you up for a lifetime of success. 

Offer Ends in

Days
Hours
Minutes

Enroll Now

we’re here to answer all your questions

Do I need a laptop for this training?

Yes. Since this is a practical, hands-on course, you will need a laptop or desktop computer to write and test your code. We will guide you on the best free and paid coding tools to use.

What programming languages will I learn?

You will learn the fundamentals and Advanced versions of JavaScript, and HTML/CSS—the most in-demand languages used in web development, data analysis, and automation.

How long does it take to learn coding?

This is an 8-week structured program, and by the end of the training, you’ll be able to write basic programs, build simple websites, and understand coding principles. Your progress depends on how much you practice.

Will I receive a certificate after completing the course?

Yes! You will receive a recognized digital certificate that proves your coding proficiency, which can help you secure jobs, freelance gigs, or further learning opportunities.

don't Miss Out
Act Now !!!!

This offer is STRICTLY for action-takers. The ₦200,000 discount is only valid for those who sign up TODAY.

  • The price will revert to ₦700,000 after 24 hours.
  • Only 30 slots are available to ensure personalized attention.
